item.title: SecetTalker 3.0 | Remade in Delphi, no need for SCAR! |
item.dc:creator: @mikkomainer Secet
item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

New version 2.4 now avaivable!
Features:
-No more Alt+Shift thing! Please tell me if it doesn’t work!
-You don’t have to use both color & effects
-All known issues fixed!

Ron, everything should be fixed now! Nashi helped me alot…

Hey I had that same problem your new version has lol. My old version did the same thing, it was really annoying. If you look through my auto talker, you can check it out.

item.title: SecetTalker 3.0 | Remade in Delphi, no need for SCAR! |
item.dc:creator: @mikkomainer Secet
item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

New version avaivable! Read changelog.

Thanks Ron, yea I know F1, F3, F5 are already reserved but they don’t take effect when the Runescape screen is active…
But yea I suppose I could change them to F2, F4, F8, F9 so people wont accidently refresh the window or worse
But it will come in next bigger update, I’m not gonna make update just for them.

And yes I’m aware about that shift button thingy… But I don’t know how how to fix it Help again?

And believe or not, when I send the first message to you, it was my first day in the mysterious scripting world

I hope you guys like the new setup screen

Oh and btw, this script isn’t just for SRL members, you can give it whoever you want to.

And last words, I haven’t slept for over 24hours now (I’m hooked to scripting :x) so there is most likely bad spelling in my messages :D[br][size=1]Posted at: July 25, 2006, 12:03:54 PM[/size][hr]New version 2.3 avaivable!
Features:
-Shift works now! Thanks Nashi!
-New messagebuttons are -> F2, F4, F6, F8, F9

If you have old version, download is recommed!

Read full topic
item.source: SecetTalker 3.0 | Remade in Delphi, no need for SCAR! |

item.title: SecetTalker 3.0 | Remade in Delphi, no need for SCAR! |
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

WOW SECET! This is incredible. Very very good work and it was no trouble at all. I’m glad I got first post on this, I will definitely be sending this to my friends.

I have got to read up on forms lol, it really does look quite sexy. Can’t wait for your next scripts, if they are equally good, you and many others will be rich on no time at all.

Edit: I just tested and here are my bugs/suggestions/grievances.

F1, F3, F5 are already used by Internet Explorer, Mozilla Firefox, and Opera. If you want to use unused F keys. Try using F2, F4, F8, F9, and I just tried F10, F11, F12 and they do other weird stuff lol.

And if you type in characters that require you to press shift such as an exaclamation point !, AT sign @, Number sign #, and the others. They will not show up as that character. Instead they will show up as if the shift button was never pressed. Here is an example of what I am saying.

  • If you input this sentence: Selling Yellow Bellies!!! $0.05 each!!!
  • The sentence will show up as: Selling Yellow Bellies111 $0.05 each111

Read full topic
